Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Specimen Container(s): Specimen Lysis Tube containing specimen transport media (STM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Panther Fusion AdV/hMPV/RV multiplex real-time PCR assay to detect and differentiate Adenovirus, human Metapneumovirus, and Rhinovirus from nasopharyngeal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplex real-time PCR assay for rapid and qualitative detection and differentiation of Adenovirus, human Metapneumovirus, and Rhinovirus nucleic acids from nasopharyngeal swab specimens of individuals with signs and symptoms of respiratory tract infection; aids differential diagnosis but should not be sole basis for patient management.
